doc.field: Kevin Kennedy Ephemera and Photographs Collection
Kevin Kennedy Ephemera and Photographs Collection
Series I: Kevin Kennedy Ephemera and Personal Materials
Series I: Kevin Kennedy Ephemera and Personal Materials

This series contains materials collected by Kevin Kennedy that focus upon the New York Irish community, circa 1960s-early 2000s. Some of the materials document important Irish organizations like the United Irish Counties Association, the New York County chapter of the Ancient Order of Hibernians, and the Friendly Sons of St. Patrick, as well as charitable organizations that were important to Kennedy like the Irish Guide Dogs for the Blind and the Kennedy Child Study Center in New York City. This series also contains some religious materials including prayer cards and programs from different churches commemorating various events, as well as newspapers and newsclippings, some of which feature Kennedy's published photographs.
